data.title: Cecil (Ces) Turner Memorial Ride
meta_keywords: Cecil (Ces) Turner Memorial Ride West Bay
Cecil (Ces) Turner Memorial Ride West Bay tickets
data.meta_description: Eventbrite - YFW Bloodbikes presents Cecil (Ces) Turner Memorial Ride - Sunday, September 8, 2024 at West Bay Beach Dorset, West Bay, England. Find event and ticket information.
data.text:
On the 27th of August 2023, an extraordinary individual called Cecil (Ces) Turner passed away. Ces was involved in various local charitable organisations throughout his lifetime, with his most known involvement being the founding of the Yeovil Freewheelers in 1978, known better as YFW Bloodbikes.

In remembrance of this great man and the legacy he left behind, members of YFW Bloodbikes have organised a memorial ride, with proceeds raised going to YFW Bloodbikes.

This ride will start at West Bay with registration and arrival from 08:00 am. There will be a brief before riders leave West Bay at 10:00 am taking the Jurassic Coast Road towards Weymouth, before continuing on some lovely roads toward Broadmayne, passing Bere Regis, Sturminster Newton, Lydlinch before arriving at Yeovil and ending at Yeovil Rugby club at around 12:30 pm.

Windy Corner Caf√© at Bridport have kindly offered to open early to provide tea/coffee and breakfast options, also food will be available at Yeovil Rugby Club too at the end of the ride.
